name: Climate City
description: Build a green city! This game will challenge you in ensuring your city is built to deal with the effects of climate change, all while ensuring that your residents are happy with how their money is being spent! Cities all over the US constantly deal with this balancing act of spending on their normal infrastructure and processes while building for a green future. This game places you in charge of making the tough choices to make sure your city - and its budget - is prepared for the future!
